text: @peterbakernyt But then @realDonaldTrump gets harassed by one of your liberal peers about why there are no repercussions on China. Which is it? Do you want them called out and have  repercussions or call it covid19 and leave China alone? DJT will do the right thing but your GOTCHA BS is clear!
